author: Chelseahavoc
title: Cute-a-doodle-do!
review: I was extremely excited when i found out the Easter chicken was being re-released as a 'freebie' at toys'r'us with qualifying purchase. HE has 4 pieces which are mostly detailed greatly. Legs, torso/wing-arms, face, and chicken 'mask'. when it comes to cute costumed mini figures i personally love changing their faces to fit my scenes (example: putting a screaming face on the banana minifig because he was just dumped into the garbage truck). His best feature is definitely the wings. They have good mobility and are also satisfyingly textured.

author: Ernst
title: The Hen house, living in a box !! (which is the main part)
review:
Overall 5 bricks : Nothing special in fact, a CMF in a cardboard box but a great collectors item !! The box is the main part of this cute "Easter" gift. Not officially for sale but a gift in Holland if you buy for more than € 50,00. The lay-out is adorable, happy to own it.

Building 1 brick : Really nothing to built, just an already assembled mini figure in a box.

Parts 4 bricks : I give 5 bricks for mostly the box and the mini figure and I distract 1 brick due to the lack of the small baseplate. The Iconic Easter minifigure is not really special either, it is the 2013 Chicken Suit Guy.

Playability 4 bricks : As it is nothing special but the empty box offers the opportunity to built a small interior. So the 4 bricks are for the possibilities it offers.

Value 5 bricks : Since I got it for free and small sets like this only increase in value because they are not for sale 5 bricks.
